resources.string: We need the camera permission in order to scan the QR Code
We need CAMERA for scanning QR Codes and Storage permissions in order for this xZIL to work
Before we start, we need couple of permissions.

If you continue, you agree to proceed to xZIL, a third party service. We use https://dev-api.zilliqa.com" for all the Blockchain interaction. This also can be viewed if you disassemble the application as no obfuscation is done. Your wallet is stored on your device. We DO NOT have access to your public address, private keys, pin code. All your interactions with xZIL are outside of xZIL\'s control and are subject to xZIL\'s Terms of Service. All information that you may provide to xZIL App will be subject to xZIL\'s Privacy Policy and will not be collected, stored, or used by xZIL.\n\nxZIL ACCEPTS NO RESPONSIBILITY AND WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE WHATSOEVER SUFFERED AS A RESULT OF ACCESSING, USE OF, OR RELIANCE UPON xZIL INFORMATION AND SERVICES.
